statements: SELECT * FROM gene_editing_history WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, experiment_date FROM gene_editing_history WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT gene_editor FROM gene_editing_history WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, compliance_status FROM gene_editing_history WHERE gene_editor LIKE '%CRISPR%';
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_history WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND experiment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_history WHERE crop_name='Rice';
SELECT experiment_id, gene_editor FROM gene_editing_history WHERE compliance_status=true ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, experiment_date FROM gene_editing_history WHERE gene_editor='CRISPR-Cas9' AND compliance_status=true;
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_history WHERE gene_editor IS NOT NULL AND compliance_status=true ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments, AVG(experiment_id) AS avg_experiment_id FROM gene_editing_history GROUP BY gene_editor HAVING AVG(experiment_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, crop_name FROM gene_editing_experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS experiment_count FROM gene_editing_experiments GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT e.crop_name, r.compliance_status FROM gene_editing_experiments e JOIN regulations_compliance r ON e.experiment_id = r.experiment_id WHERE r.compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_experiments WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT experiment_id, crop_name, experiment_date FROM gene_editing_experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, count(*) AS total_experiments FROM gene_editing_experiments GROUP BY experiment_id;

SELECT gene_editing_experiments.*, regulations_compliance.compliance_status FROM gene_editing_experiments JOIN regulations_compliance ON gene_editing_experiments.experiment_id = regulations_compliance.experiment_id;

SELECT gene_editing_experiments.*, regulations_compliance.* FROM gene_editing_experiments LEFT JOIN regulations_compliance ON gene_editing_experiments.experiment_id = regulations_compliance.experiment_id WHERE regulations_compliance.compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_experiments;
SELECT crop_name, researcher_name FROM gene_editing_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, editing_technique, experiment_date FROM gene_editing_experiments WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM experiment_results ORDER BY gene_expression_level DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM gene_editing_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, crop_name, editing_technique FROM gene_editing_experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM experiment_results WHERE gene_expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;

SELECT gene_editing_experiments.experiment_id, gene_editing_experiments.crop_name, regulatory_compliance.compliance_status FROM gene_editing_experiments JOIN regulatory_compliance ON gene_editing_experiments.experiment_id = regulatory_compliance.experiment_id;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(experiment_id) AS total_experiments FROM gene_editing_experiments GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING COUNT(experiment_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_experiments DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneEditingExperiment
SELECT id, crop_name, researcher_name FROM GeneEditingExperiment
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT result, experiment_id FROM ExperimentResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT id, crop_name FROM GeneEditingExperiment WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM GeneEditingExperiment;
SELECT crop_name, researcher_name FROM GeneEditingExperiment WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT regulatory_body, compliance_date FROM RegulationCompliance WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT approval_status, approval_date FROM ApprovalRecords WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, edit_date FROM genes WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, origin_country FROM crops WHERE origin_country IN ('USA', 'Canada') LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date ASC, researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC, edit_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, origin_country FROM crops WHERE crop_type='Fruit' AND origin_country='USA';
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' AND experiment_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT genes.gene_name, crops.crop_name, compliance_logs.compliance_status FROM genes JOIN crops ON genes.id = crops.gene_id JOIN compliance_logs ON crops.id = compliance_logs.experiment_id ORDER BY genes.gene_name ASC, compliance_logs.compliance_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_description LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY regulation_number ASC;
